content: It's a shame more people aren't downloading this app! It's also a problem when I search Google play store for COVID-19 apps and they only show 2 apps that aren't even for my area. I appreciate you and your team for helping with the issue 🙏

Micha Benoliel - Do you go stalking everyone who leaves a negative review about your products? I know you visited my linkedin, so I guess you visited all my other social profiles. Privacy isn't much of a concern to you or your company. I definitly came to the right conclusion about this app. I saw your previous reply before you deleted it. I'm just a user. Your behaviour is disgusting. I'm reporting you to Google.
replyContent: We like to understand your point of view and still don't understand your review and invite you to learn about how this protocol is working in there: https://docsend.com/view/nis3dac We do take privacy seriously otherwise we wound't have spent months bringing a privacy first solution for free and advice and educate the market. Good luck!

content: Good concept and technology behind. Only a minor downside with some phone models draining the battwry but I see they are working to fix the issues.
replyContent: Hi Joaquin, can you share the model of your Android phone and the version of your operating system so we can understand why it drains your battery so much. Please email: support@nodle.io

content: I like the level of privacy assured and I recommended it on NextDoor. But I have a question. As long as people are sheltered in place it won't be too bad, but even now: say you notify everyone who crosses paths with an infected person. All those people are going to want to be tested, naturally. Are tests available in that amount? And if someone is asymptomatic, how long are they contagious? I'll google it, but I like the idea of app, as a cautious UberEats delivery driver. SF Chron 👍
replyContent: These are all important questions which are difficult to answer. As I mentioned in our email tread Digital contact tracing and manual contact racing combined can help decrease the amount of daily tests required. As you mention, it is an important tool and it could also help drivers or ride sharing companies who are interacting with a lot of people

content: The app we all need for reliable contact-tracing with security and privacy in mind.
Privacy and security oriented tracker especially useful during pandemics.
